title: Island Adventures
description: As Connor and Lynn embark on their journeys, fate intervened once again as they discover they are headed to the same vacation destination, turning the ultimate single's retreat into two weeks of couple's bliss. As these lovers unite, their romance is set ablaze creating a lifetime of lustful memories on their island adventures. They learn more about themselves and each other, as these two star-crossed lovers nourish their new budding love. Yet, as their love story begins to develop, outside forces begin to wreak havoc on the couple. Connor and Lynn become embattled by naysayers with evil intentions and even deadlier actions, leaving the question, who is lurking behind the scenes to destroy Connor and Lynn? And what's more, can this new love withstand?Find out in the jaw-dropping sequel... The WanderLynn Experience: Island Adventures.
author: L. Loren
